properties.name: websocket.url
properties.description: Specific websocket URL to connect the client to.

properties.name: websocket.destination
properties.description: Destination to which the client is sending Messages to.

properties.name: websocket.subscription
properties.description: Topic to subscribe to - receiving messages from there.

properties.name: websocket.retry-attempts
properties.description: Max. attempts in retrying to establish a connection with the server.

properties.name: websocket.retry-timeout
properties.description: Maximum duration waiting, before trying for another retry.
